Director: Abhishek Chaubey, Saket Chaudhary, Ashwiny Iyer Tiwari
Screenwriter: Piyush Gupta, Hussain Haidry, Shreyas Jain, Zeenat Lakhani, Nitesh Tiwari
Synopsis: As big city life buzzes around them, lonely souls discover surprising sources of connection and companionship in three tales of love, loss and longing.
Title: Ankahi Kahaniya
